item.description:
We're back on Tour! For May we will be visiting Elaine and Francis' property in Portland - a classic small residential lot with a bungalow and gardens - to discuss what they've done so far and what permaculture principles/projects will be employed this year!

Let's meet at 6pm to get some daylight time outside followed by potluck/discussion starting around 7:00 or so...all experience levels welcome!

DISCUSSION TOPIC after introductions - for those who have introduced permaculture concepts onto their property, what's been different about this spring vs. previous years?

For those that have joined the group recently, our meetups during the outside months involve a potluck at someone's home, looking at their property and discussing their plans and wishes to move in a more "permculture" direction. We often have a theme or topic for discussion as well.

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring salad or veg or dessert
Last name starting with H-M bring whatever you want
Last name starting with N-S bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with T-Z main or side dish to share
We'll rotate this list each month so won't be stuck in a rut:)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: May Portland Maine Permaculture Meetup
